extendedInfo.description: ****Queen of Fire Live Wallpaper**** is finally available after popular demand here on Google Play for all Android users!Is defined by many as:Queen of FireRadiant with life, magnetic and warm, this Queen is the inspiring force of art, passion and creative endeavors. She is the spark, the source, the flame that sets the whole world ablaze... the Immortal Beloved for whom battles are fought, works of art and music are created, legends are forged.If she burns within your heart, be grateful, for you can accomplish anything with this vision before you, whether you embody her yourself, or hold her as your inspiration...This is simply the very best Queen of Fire Live Wallpaper you will ever install for FREE onto your Android phone.Simply put, you will be insanely impressed with the motion wallpapers of the Fire Queen in her "natural" environment is sure to impress, when coming to life right onto your phone.You can save this live motion wallpaper and set as a background image so that you will never get bored of a "still" image again.We have several featured settings foe you to enjoy as well.Place your finger on the screen and drag the Queen's fire around the screen. The fire from hell will follow your finger around the screen. Change the color, frequency and size of the fire.  You can also create fire bombs as well.Setting options include:COLOR OF FIREFLAME SIZEFREQUENCY OF FLAMESENABLE TOUCH TOGGLEENABLE RANDOM FLAMEFLAME SETTINGSYou need to install this right now to enjoy this very accurate looking Sexy Fire Queen wallpaper with Flame effect.We hope you enjoy this wonderful high quality Queen of Fire Live Wallpaper application as much as we did making it for you!Please don't hesitate to notify us if you have any questions. Please save this application onto your phone as we will be upgrading this application on a monthly basis.  We hope you enjoy this wonderful high quality Queen of Fire Live Wallpaper application as much as we did making it for you!We ask that after playing with this application that you leave a positive review so that other users can benefit from your comments and enjoy this very top quality Queen of Fire Live Wallpaper application.No Icons and No Annoying Push ads!When you click on advertisements delivered by Queen of Fire Live WallpaperYou will typically be directed to a third-partyâs web page. We may pass certain information to the third parties operating or hosting these pages, including your email address, phone number, and a list of other apps on your device.
